post.text: If you're voting for Hillary, don't stop there. We need to support Democrats down the ticket to make her vision for America a reality.

comment.author: Savana
comment.text: I hated Obamacare 8 years ago when my premium doubled but now I love it because President Trump is using it as a campaign weapon. Thanks Obama.

replies.author: Matthew
replies.text: Well gee we will have to see what he gives you on return if he gets in. Lol

replies.author: Savana
replies.text: I may not get anything but a little lower health ins premium, but alll those blue color workers will get their jobs back.

replies.author: Kiernan
replies.text: Bill and Hillary got rich off of NAFTA. I just drove by another empty factory.

replies.author: Savana
replies.text: Kiernan , that's what I am talking about.

replies.author: Kylie
replies.text: Is it possible to lock up that driveling idiot Trey Gowdy? Lock him up, lock him up. At least inmates get free decent hair cuts. Embarrassing he is a congressman, and embarrassing he was graduated from whatever backwater school he attended. He probably ratted out classmates to the principal. What a hysterical fool. Kind of like an evil Don Knotts.
